languages.text: Шаттлы стартовали один за другим и разлетелись, направляясь каждый к избранной цели. Час работы резаками в холодной пустоте, нервозность высадки — и вот, наконец, Вольный Торговец ступил{mf||а} на холодную и темную палубу мертвого корабля. Свет фонарей выхватил из тьмы табличку с названием — "Рожденный в огне". Минута переговоров с Мастером вокса, проверившей архивы — и мертвый корабль был опознан как судно капитана Новы ван Дейн, приписанное к порту Кьявы Гамма.

traits.locale_text: Шаттлы стартовали один за другим и разлетелись, направляясь каждый к избранной цели. Несколько часов ушло на выбор точки внедрения, работу резаками в холодной пустоте за бортом и стыковку с корпусом. И вот, наконец, Вольный Торговец ступил{mf||а} на холодную и темную палубу мертвого корабля. Свет фонарей выхватил из тьмы табличку с названием — "Рожденный в огне". Минута переговоров с Мастером Вокса, проверившей архивы — и мертвый корабль был опознан как судно капитана Новы ван Дейн, приписанное к порту Кьява Гамма.

languages.text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.
languages.original_text: Шаттлы стартовали один за другим и разлетелись, направляясь каждый к избранной цели. Час работы резаками в холодной пустоте, нервозность высадки — и вот, наконец, Вольный Торговец ступил{mf||а} на холодную и темную палубу мертвого корабля. Свет фонарей выхватил из тьмы табличку с названием — "Рожденный в огне". Минута переговоров с Мастером вокса, проверившей архивы — и мертвый корабль был опознан как судно капитана Новы ван Дейн, приписанное к порту Кьявы Гамма.

traits.locale_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. Several hours were given over to identifying the insertion point, cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, and docking. And then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Master of the Vox, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. Several hours were given over to identifying the insertion point, cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, and docking. And then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Master of the Vox, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. Several hours were given over to identifying the insertion point, cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, and docking. And then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Master of the Vox, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

languages.text: Las lanzaderas partieron una tras otra y se dispersaron, cada una dirigida a su objetivo. Tras una hora cortando el casco en el gélido vacío del espacio y después de un abordaje un tanto brusco, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente por fin puso pie en la oscura cubierta de la nave muerta. A la luz de las antorchas, encontró un letrero en la penumbra que rezaba «Nacida del Fuego». A continuación, una conversación de un minuto con la maestra de vocos le permitió descubrir que la nave había pertenecido a la capitana Nova van Dayne y estaba registrada en el puerto de Kiava Gamma.
languages.original_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

traits.locale_text: Las lanzaderas partieron una tras otra y se dispersaron, cada una dirigida a su objetivo. Tras una hora cortando el casco en el gélido vacío del espacio y después de un abordaje un tanto brusco, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente por fin puso pie en la oscura cubierta de la nave muerta. A la luz de las antorchas, encontró un letrero en la penumbra que rezaba «Nacida del Fuego». A continuación, una conversación de un minuto con la maestra de vocos le permitió descubrir que la nave había pertenecido a la capitana Nova van Dayne y estaba registrada en el puerto de Kiava Gamma.

languages.text: 穿梭机离开了虚空舰，朝着各自的目标前进。行商浪人的穿梭机在太空中花了一个小时，才将厚重的船体切开。经历了繁复的登船步骤之后，行商浪人终于进入了这艘毫无生气的飞船，踏上了冰冷、阴暗的甲板。火光照亮了黑暗之中的船标“烈焰之子”。行商浪人和音阵大师进行了长达一分钟的交流。音阵大师快速查阅了档案，最终确定这艘失事舰船曾属于诺娃·冯·戴恩舰长，这艘飞船曾在基亚瓦伽马星的港口注册过。
languages.original_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

traits.locale_text: 穿梭机离开了虚空舰，朝着各自的目标前进。行商浪人的穿梭机在太空中花了一个小时，才将厚重的船体切开。经历了繁复的登船步骤之后，行商浪人终于进入了这艘毫无生气的飞船，踏上了冰冷、阴暗的甲板。火光照亮了黑暗之中的船标“烈焰之子”。行商浪人和音阵大师进行了长达一分钟的交流。音阵大师快速查阅了档案，最终确定这艘失事舰船曾属于诺娃·冯·戴恩舰长，这艘飞船曾在基亚瓦伽马星的港口注册过。

languages.text: シャトルは次々と動き出して分散し、それぞれが決められた目標へと向かった。宇宙の凍てつく真空の中で船体を切り裂くのに1時間費やし、バタバタと乗り込む。そしてついに、自由開拓者は、死んだ船の冷たく暗いデッキに足を踏み入れる。たいまつの光が暗闇の中に「ファイアボーン」の看板を照らしだした。すぐにアーカイブをチェックしたヴォクスマスターと1分間のやりとりして、死んだ船はキアヴァ・ガンマに登録されていたノヴァ・ヴァン・ダイン船長のものであることが判明した。
languages.original_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

traits.locale_text: シャトルは次々と動き出して分散し、それぞれが決められた目標へと向かった。宇宙の凍てつく真空の中で船体を切り裂くのに1時間費やし、バタバタと乗り込む。そしてついに、自由開拓者は、死んだ船の冷たく暗いデッキに足を踏み入れる。たいまつの光が暗闇の中に「ファイアボーン」の看板を照らしだした。すぐにアーカイブをチェックしたヴォクスマスターと1分間のやりとりして、死んだ船はキアヴァ・ガンマに登録されていたノヴァ・ヴァン・ダイン船長のものであることが判明した。

languages.text: Die Shuttles starteten der Reihe nach und nahmen dann Kurs auf ihr jeweiliges Ziel. Es dauerte eine Stunde, im eisigen Vakuum des Weltraums ein Loch in den Rumpf zu schneiden, das dann mit höchster Vorsicht durchschritten wurde – und schließlich setzte {mf|der Freihändler seinen|die Freihändlerin ihren} Fuß auf das kalte, dunkle Deck des toten Schiffs. Das Licht der Lampen offenbarte eine Inschrift: "Fireborn." Nach einem einminütigen Gespräch mit der Voxmeisterin, die rasch die Archive überprüfte, stellte sich heraus, dass das tote Schiff unter dem Kommando von Captain Nova van Dayne stand und auf Kiava Gamma registriert war.
languages.original_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

traits.locale_text: Die Shuttles starteten der Reihe nach und nahmen dann Kurs auf ihr jeweiliges Ziel. Es dauerte eine Stunde, im eisigen Vakuum des Weltraums ein Loch in den Rumpf zu schneiden, das dann mit höchster Vorsicht durchschritten wurde – und schließlich setzte {mf|der Freihändler seinen|die Freihändlerin ihren} Fuß auf das kalte, dunkle Deck des toten Schiffs. Das Licht der Lampen offenbarte eine Inschrift: "Fireborn." Nach einem einminütigen Gespräch mit der Voxmeisterin, die rasch die Archive überprüfte, stellte sich heraus, dass das tote Schiff unter dem Kommando von Captain Nova van Dayne stand und auf Kiava Gamma registriert war.

languages.text: Les navettes démarrèrent l'une après l'autre et se dispersèrent en direction de leurs cibles. Après une heure passée à découper le fuselage dans le vide glacial de l'espace, suivie par un embarquement difficile, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} mit enfin les pieds sur le pont sombre et froid de l'épave. À la lumière des torches, des lettres formant le nom « Flamboyant » se révélèrent dans l'obscurité. Un bref échange avec la maîtresse-vox, qui consulta rapidement les archives, permit d'établir que le vaisseau était enregistré au port de Kiava Gamma, au nom de la capitaine Nova van Dayne.
languages.original_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

Après une heure passée à découper le fuselage dans le vide glacial de l'espace, suivie par un embarquement difficile, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} mit enfin les pieds sur le pont sombre et froid de l'épave. À la lumière des torches, des lettres formant le nom « Flamboyant » se révélèrent dans l'obscurité. Un bref échange avec la maîtresse-vox, qui consulta rapidement les archives, permit d'établir que le vaisseau était enregistré au port de Kiava Gamma, au nom de la capitaine Nova van Dayne.

languages.text: Mekikler birbiri ardına harekete geçip kendi hedefleri doğrultusunda yola koyuldular. Uzayın merhametsiz soğuğunda dış gövdenin delinmesi, yaklaşık bir saat sürdü. Ancak çabalar meyvesini verdi ve Hür Tacir, ölü olduğu kadar soğuk ve karanlık bu gemiye ayak bastı. Meşalelerin ışığı, kasvete gömülmüş "Ateşten" levhasını aydınlattı. Arşivlere göz atan Voks Üstadı ile bir dakika kadar bilgi alışverişi yapıldı. Bu görüşme ışığında ölü geminin, Kiava Gama limanına kayıtlı Kaptan Nova van Dayne'a ait olduğu ortaya çıktı.
languages.original_text: The shuttles started up one after another and dispersed, each heading for its selected target. An hour spent on cutting through the hull in the freezing vacuum of space, a fussy boarding — and then, finally, the Rogue Trader stepped onto the cold, dark deck of the dead ship. The light of the torches revealed a sign in the gloom — "Fireborn." After a minute-long exchange with the Vox Master, who quickly checked the archives, it was established that the dead vessel was that of Captain Nova van Dayne, registered at Kiava Gamma port.

traits.locale_text: Mekikler birbiri ardına harekete geçti, kendi hedefleri doğrultusunda yola koyuldular. Uzayın merhametsiz soğuğunda dış gövdenin delinmesi, yaklaşık bir saat sürdü. Ancak çabalar meyvesini verdi ve Hür Tacir, ölü olduğu kadar soğuk ve karanlık bu gemiye ayak bastı. Meşalelerin ışığı kasvete gömülmüş "Ateşten" levhasını aydınlattı. Arşivlere göz atan Voks Üstadı ile bir dakika kadar bilgi alışverişi yapıldı. Bu görüşme ışığında ölü geminin, Kiava Gama limanına atanmış Kaptan Nova van Dayne'a ait olduğu ortaya çıktı.
